title: Ticket #3797: default NEGOTIATOR_POST_JOB_RANK goes to undefined when benchmarks off
description: If the startd is configured to not run benchmarks, the Kflops attribute is not in the machine ad. The default negotiator NEGOTIATOR_POST_JOB_RANK expression assumes that kflops is in the machine ad, and will thus evaluated to undefined. This causes a lot of noise in the the negotiator log, and the rank doesn't work as expected.
